hero.subtitle: 30 years of experience in the IT Industry.

portfolio.feature-1-sub: I am currently working on a project called MateApp.ar. Feel free to learn more about it!

about.title: ABOUT ME:
about.p-1: I've been working in the Information Technology Industry since 1992.
about.p-2: I have work for small companies, large corporation and I have also run my own bussines.
about.p-3: I consider myself a life long learner, and I regularly assist to training on new technologies.
about.p-4: I am open to work as a freelance consultant and developer.
